Articles.Content:
My first attempt at a combat based spacecraft. Seven (7) shot decoupler/sepratron cannon on the nose, two mount points on the nose, and 4 mount points for smart missiles on the underside. It is a "figher" so there is plenty of RCS thrusters and RCS fuel to get you pointed in the right direction FAST! There are also two blocks of linear RCS thrusters on the nose (Toggled on/off with "0")...incase you're coming in a little too hot and need to get on the "brakes." Be sure to check out the "Very Kerbal" ejection system; Stage 2 & 1. Fire them sequentially. Do not combine them. Otherwise it will only work 10% of the time instead of the expected 50% )

The launch vehicle is good to a 80km stable orbit. It gets a bit tricky past 25km as it develops the spins. Ignore the spinning, she'll hold together. Just fight with WSAD to keep the gimble somewhere in the blue until you drop the second set of mainsails, and then it will be pretty easy to get back on course.

Also, the name does not only apply to the shape! It does possess some traveling capabilities as well. Over 2000dv on the craft itself.

Craft File: https://www.dropbox.com/s/bqp6hu5of4bjrz4/Delta%20V1%20%28Stock%29.craft
